divs: sighting detailssaw object 60 to 70 yards in length square\rectangular with rounded corner just below treetop level about 10 feet in the air...and creature approached me having dark eyes that curved, large head, very slim body, slightly musclular...creature talked to me by telepathy for approx 3 hours. he realized after these conversations that they have been watching us for many many years, checking out our culture, our reactions to things and events. helping with our help....
Summary: I was approached by one creature about 4'5
trends: There have been no other sightings in Bald Knob
This sighting has never been favorited.
